reasoning: Reporting incidence of all malignant kidney cancers. GLOBOCAN 2005 estimates ~7.6 per 100k globally. Includes renal cell carcinoma (90%), transitional cell carcinoma, Wilms tumor, and other rare types. Higher in developed countries (10-15 per 100k).
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
